required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of TRV130 for the Treatment of Pain After Abdominoplasty
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo- and Active-controlled Study of TRV130 for the Treatment of Acute Postoperative Pain Following Abdominoplasty

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective is to evaluate the analgesic efficacy of IV TRV130 compared with placebo in patients with acute postoperative pain following abdominoplasty.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary objective is to evaluate the analgesic efficacy of intravenous (IV) TRV130 administered via patient controlled analgesia device (PCA) compared with placebo administered via PCA in patients with moderate to severe, acute postoperative pain following abdominoplasty.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Time Weighted Average (TWA) Change From Baseline in Pain Score Over 24 Hours Between TRV130 and Placebo
primary_outcome.description: Pain intensity will be evaluated using an 11-point (0-10) Numeric Pain Rating Scale (NPRS), with higher numbers indicating a higher pain intensity, administered over 24 hours. Time weighted average change from baseline is calculated using the following: time weighted sum of pain intensity differences (SPID) divided by a constant (24 hours) to yield values on the 0-10 NPRS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time Weighted Average (TWA) Change From Baseline in Pain Score Over 24 Hours Between TRV130 and Morphine
secondary_outcome.description: Pain intensity will be evaluated using an 11-point (0-10) Numeric Pain Rating Scale (NPRS), with higher numbers indicating a higher pain intensity, administered over 24 hours. Time weighted average change from baseline is calculated using the following: time weighted sum of pain intensity differences (SPID) divided by a constant (24 hours) to yield values on the 0-10 NPRS.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- >=18 and <=65 years of age.
- Plans to undergo an abdominoplasty procedure with no additional collateral procedures.
- Is able to understand and comply with the procedures and study requirements, and to provide written informed consent before any study procedure.
Exclusion Criteria:
- ASA Physical Status Classification System classification of P3 or worse.
- Has surgical or post-surgical complications.
- Has clinically significant medical conditions or history of such conditions that may interfere with the interpretation of efficacy, safety, or tolerability data obtained in the trial, or may interfere with the absorption, distribution, metabolism, or excretion of drugs.
- Has previously participated in another TRV130 clinical study.

group.title: Protocol v1-4 TRV130 0.1 mg
group.description: TRV130 loading doses totaling 1.5 mg. TRV130 0.1 mg PCA with 6-min lockout.

group.title: Protocol v1-4 Morphine
group.description: Morphine loading doses totaling 4 mg. Morphine 1 mg PCA with 6-min lockout.

group.title: Protocol v1-4 Placebo
group.description: Placebo (5% D5W) loading doses totaling 4 ml. Placebo 1 ml PCA with 6-min lockout.

group.title: Protocol v5 TRV130 0.35 mg
group.description: TRV130 loading doses totaling 1.5 mg. TRV130 0.35 mg PCA with 6-min lockout.

group.description: Morphine loading doses totaling 4 mg. Morphine 1 mg PCA with 6-min lockout.

group.description: Placebo (5% D5W) loading doses totaling 4 ml. Placebo 1 ml PCA with 6-min lockout.
